mainboard.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.
Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Hellion Eruption
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
mainboard.oracle_text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

mainboard.name: Fateful End
mainboard.oracle_text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.

mainboard.name: Clifftop Retreat
mainboard.oracle_text:
Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

mainboard.name: Lightning Bolt
mainboard.oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Siege-Gang Commander
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Terramorphic Expanse
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Makeshift Munitions
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Oblivion Ring
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Faithless Looting
mainboard.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainboard.name: Restoration Angel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

mainboard.name: Grim Initiate
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass Zombies 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Zombie. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

mainboard.name: Spectral Procession
mainboard.oracle_text: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

mainboard.name: Rockslide Elemental
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.

mainboard.name: Gold Myr
mainboard.oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.

mainboard.name: Alseid of Life's Bounty
mainboard.oracle_text:
Lifelink
{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

mainboard.name: Glory of Warfare
mainboard.oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.

mainboard.name: Furycalm Snarl
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

mainboard.name: Meadowboon
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

mainboard.name: Rabbit Battery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

mainboard.name: Shinewend
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.

mainboard.name: Swords to Plowshares
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

mainboard.name: Gluttonous Slime
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

mainboard.name: Anointed Procession
mainboard.oracle_text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

mainboard.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
mainboard.oracle_text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

mainboard.name: Jinxed Idol
mainboard.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
